name: me & Eti
title: I went to his house to take a look at him before the wedding. That day, he called me to accept our relationship with his family.

title: Sometimes I would meet my girlfriend Eti at a restaurant, and she would come home without telling anyone, wearing a college frock.

title: I'm coming to eat fuchka with my girlfriend.

title: When no one at home accepted our relationship, we ran away and got married.

title: I married him and moved away from my family, and that night I sat down to eat at a restaurant.

title: After marriage, the two of us lived like this, we didn't have much money at the time.

name: me & Eti
title: This is how we spend our days, fighting over the two of us.
